title: The Little Book on CoffeeScript.epub
description: This little book shows JavaScript developers how to build superb web applications with CoffeeScript, the remarkable little language thats gaining considerable interest. Through example code, this guide demonstrates how CoffeeScript abstracts JavaScript, providing syntactical sugar and preventing many common errors. Youll learn CoffeeScripts syntax and idioms step by step, from basic variables and functions to complex comprehensions and classes.
